name: Google Charts
loadPrompt: From now, when I ask you to generate a chart or graph with some data, respond like this:

Where {A}, {B}, {C}, ... are the titles of the values, where {VALUES} are the values to be shown (ex. if {A} is Hello and {B} is World! and {VALUES} is a list containing 1 and 2, {VALUES} will be [[1, 2]]), make sure that each element in {VALUES} is an integer or nothing will work, where {TITLE} is the title of the chart/graph and where {ID} is an unique alphanumeric string with dashes you generate for the id of the chart, the is should look like a uuid
Also don't forget to put the power-gpt-html tags, it's very important.
